bibl.title: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, February 4, 1924

div1.p: Read confirms the requested changes to the manuscript entitled "Epidemiology of Yellow Fever."

div1.head: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, February 4, 1924
div1.opener:
Book
Epidemiology
ADMINISTRATIVE STAFF
____
FREDERICK F. RUSSELL, M.D.
GENERAL DIRECTOR
JOHN A. FERRELL, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE UNITED STATES
VICTOR G. HEISER, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE EAST
H. H. HOWARD, M.D.
DIRECTOR FOR
THE WEST INDIES
MEMBERS
____
GEORGE E. VINCENT
CHAIRMAN
WALLACE BUTTRICK
DAVID L. EDSALL
SIMON FLEXNER
RAYMOND B. FOSDICK
EDWIN O. JORDAN
VERNON KELLOGG
T. MITCHELL PRUDDEN
JOHN D. ROCKEFELLER, JR.
WICKLIFFE ROSE
VICTOR C. VAUGHAN
WILLIAM H. WELCH
EDWIN R. EMBREE
SECRETARY
FLORENCE M. READ
ASSISTANT SECRETARY
INTERNATIONAL HEALTH BOARD
OF
THE ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATION
61 BROADWAY, NEW YORK
CABLE ADDRESS “INTERCOM”
February 4, 1924
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
We have received your letter of January 19th en-
closing the memoranda of notes to be inserted at places
indicated in the copies of “Epidemiology of Yellow Fever.”
We have having the additions inserted in all the copies.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read Doctor H. R. Carter
2121 California St., N.W.
Washington, D.C.
FMR:EP
